name: Left 4 Dead 2: Beta Pack
description: The Left 4 Dead 2 Beta Restoration Project gives the Left 4 Dead community a faithful remake of the Left 4 Dead 2 E3 Demo, a pre-release build of Left 4 Dead 2 that showcases many unused designs, features, and concepts. Using this mod pack, Left 4 Dead 2 players can relive the unique experience from E3 2009. I worked as project co-lead and lead graphic designer, as well as contributing to various scripts, level design, and playtesting.

name: Examen: A Confession App
description: A Windows Forms application designed to guide users through a structured Catholic examination of conscience. The program walks users through identifying sins, customizing their preparation, selecting optional prayers, and finally receiving a step-by-step Confession guide tailored to their selections. The goal of the project is to provide a simple, accessible, and reverent tool to help Catholics prepare for Confession with clarity and sincerity.

name: BishopBot
description: A discord bot built using Node.js and the Discord.js library. BishopBot is designed to help users cite the Catholic Catechism quickly and easily within Discord servers. The bot responds to speciifc commands by fetching and displaying relevant Catechism passages, making it a valuable tool for individuals and communities seeking to deepen their understanding of Catholic teachings. It also offers additional features, such as information on heresies and Church councils.

name: Portfolio Site
description: A personal portfolio website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This site showcases my projects, skills, and experiences in a clean and professional manner. It is designed to be responsive and user-friendly, ensuring that visitors can easily navigate and access information about my work across various devices.
